javadoc:
A null-terminated string {@link DataType} with a UTF-16 {@link CharsetSettingsDefinition charset}.

NOTE: TerminatedUnicodeDataType class was renamed to TerminatedUnicodeStringDataType to address problem where this factory data-type may have previously been added to composites.
name: TerminatedUnicodeDataType
comment:
A null-terminated string DataType with a UTF-16 CharsetSettingsDefinition.
 

 NOTE: TerminatedUnicodeDataType class was renamed to TerminatedUnicodeStringDataType to
 address problem where this factory data-type may have previously been added to
 composites.
